summary: This is a brief email forwarding the DOJ OPR report on Jeffrey Epstein. The email notes that the media has obtained the report, but it was not officially made public by the Department and still requires OPR authorization for further dissemination.
keyFacts: The DOJ OPR (Office of Professional Responsibility) produced a report on Jeffrey Epstein.
The media had obtained the OPR report as of November 13, 2020.
The report was not officially made public by the Department of Justice at that time.
Further dissemination of the report required authorization from the DOJ OPR.
